attributes.action: create a national body to oversee the creation of a useable public transport system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current bus service providers are commercial entities and can do whatever they want as all the local councils can do is slap their wrists.  When the services run across council borders this gets even worse as you have to coordinate the wrist slapping.  We need a national body to oversee the provision of a useable public transport system to give people a viable alternative to using their cars.
